Supreme Court.truth: Unelected judges declared themselves final authority in Marbury v Madison (1803). No constitutional basis.
Supreme Court.role: Illegitimate but functions as controlling judicial body today.

logical_assessment.pros: Can strike down bad laws quickly.
logical_assessment.cons: Destroys separation of powers; overrides Congress & States.

OPEC/ESG/Climate Treaties.truth: Energy policies and global treaties keep nations dependent on oligarch-controlled systems.
OPEC/ESG/Climate Treaties.role: Leverage to control geopolitics and national independence.

logical_assessment.cons: Limits national sovereignty and creates economic leverage for foreign powers.

Big Pharma/WHO.truth: Global health organizations influence medicine, vaccines, and emergency declarations.
Big Pharma/WHO.role: Power over healthcare policy and drug distribution.

logical_assessment.cons: Centralized control can be misused; profit-driven influence.

FED/BIS.truth: Central banks control money supply, debt, and interest rates globally.
FED/BIS.role: Power to manipulate economies and financial dependency.

logical_assessment.cons: Enables systemic debt, economic control, and inflation manipulation.

Big Tech.truth: Tech companies harvest data and enforce censorship globally.
Big Tech.role: Control over information and public perception.

Gates/Soros Foundations.truth: NGOs with global influence overlapping in health, governance, and AI policy.
Gates/Soros Foundations.role: Leverage through funding networks and advisory platforms.

logical_assessment.pros: Funding for health and research projects.
logical_assessment.cons: Influence on national policies and agendas.

Epstein Network.truth: Connected individuals leveraged access, donations, and logistics for influence.
Epstein Network.role: Power network through finance and personal leverage.

logical_assessment.cons: Criminal and unethical behavior; compromises political figures.

Repurposed Drugs.truth: Some drugs like Ivermectin, Fenbendazole, Metformin show preclinical or off-label anti-cancer activity.
Repurposed Drugs.role: Adjunct or experimental therapy outside standard medical consensus.

logical_assessment.cons: Limited human data; unknown dosing and toxicity risks.

Judicial Supremacy.truth: Unelected courts can overrule nations’ laws, undermining constitutions.

logical_assessment.cons: Subverts legislative authority and constitutional limits.

Desalination/Infrastructure.truth: Government coercion and funding threats influence local projects.
Desalination/Infrastructure.role: Tool for political leverage over infrastructure decisions.

Hollywood Influence.truth: Media and entertainment industries shape public perception and social narratives.
Hollywood Influence.role: Cultural soft power and agenda influence.

logical_assessment.cons: Can manipulate beliefs and normalize agendas.

Energy/Power Dependence.truth: Energy resources and treaties determine national independence and leverage.
Energy/Power Dependence.role: Control of energy creates geopolitical influence.

logical_assessment.cons: Enables external control and economic coercion.
